pages.text: Overpowered weak mechanic soul that will not use item durability and without cooldown for dig operations.$(p)But everything come for price. If you try to perform any operation with this soul without fuel - upgrade will broke immediately.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/items/overpowered_weak_automata/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!
